video_prompt: Chaotic space battle unfolds. Spaceships fire crisscrossing lasers and create explosions. A massive cubic structure pulses with emanating light. A sleek blue-and-white vessel moves rapidly towards the cube's core. Other ships fly erratically, leaving glowing trails. A tentacled alien craft shifts amidst the conflict.
image_prompt: Generate a wide-angle, action-packed image of a chaotic space battle looking up at a massive, dark cubic structure at its center, against a starry, dark blue-black sky. The cube emanates a blinding white-blue light from its core, its surface detailed with angular protrusions and glowing red areas. A sleek, blue and white spaceship with gold accents and blue thrusters is positioned centrally, interacting with the cube's light. Numerous other spaceships are engaged in battle, firing red and blue laser beams and creating orange and yellow explosions. Include a menacing alien spacecraft with tentacle-like appendages in the upper right. The scene should convey intense conflict and high energy, with detailed ships and scattered stars.
refined_video_prompt: A chaotic space battle unfolds. Spaceships fire crisscrossing lasers and generate expanding explosions. A massive cubic structure pulses with emanating light. A sleek blue-and-white vessel rapidly accelerates towards the cube's core. Other ships fly erratically, their glowing trails streaking across the void. A tentacled alien craft continuously shifts and writhes amidst the intensifying conflict.
